alert.note: Alert for Camden; Dallas; Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 8:33AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dallas, Laclede and southeastern Camden Counties through 900 AM CDT... At 833 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Buffalo, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lebanon... Bennett Spring State Park... Ha Ha Tonka State Park... Camdenton... Conway... Phillipsburg... Stoutland... Bennett Springs... Twin Bridges... Windyville... Eldridge... Leadmine... Pumpkin Center... Sleeper... Decaturville... Plad... Long Lane... Dry Knob... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 111 and 143. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
